title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
description:
WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie. Slate's Dana Stevens, Josh Levin, and Seth Stevenson discuss Talladega Nights, a comedy starring Will Ferrell as a NASCAR driver.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
